Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: In Love with My Best Friend
1.plot: Four sets of friends risk it all when they try dating each other for the first time. In New York, a secret crush is revealed when Alex asks out Kris, his best friend of 8 years. Meanwhile Marshana hints to recently separated Stefan that her feelings may be more than just platonic. In Los Angeles, newly-single Charley asks his bestie Darion to be more than friends, while lovesick Sydney chases best friend and single mom Jin, whose ex-husband lives in her basement.

2.title: All in or I'm Out
2.plot: First dates between best friends prove to be problematic. Kris demands commitment from Alex before they even order dessert, while uptight Darion is ready to bail when the date Charley planned doesn't meet his expectations. Smooth Sydney gets a shocking surprise as he tries to woo Jin, and Marshana puts her pride on the line to get physical with Stefan.

3.title: How to Lose a Friends in 10 Days
3.plot: Mixed signals cause major mayhem as the couples try to move beyond friendship. Sydney is set off when Jin confesses to dating other men, as Darion and Charley dive in for an awkward first kiss. Kris does some cyber-stalking that leads to a confrontation with Alex, while Marshana and Stefan try to relive their first date from 4 years ago, with disastrous results.

4.title: You've Got Hate Mail
4.plot: Things get complicated for the friends-turned-couples as Marshana confesses her secret love for Stefan. Sydney tries to win back a skeptical Jin, while Charley is called out for sneaking off to a party without Darion. Kris confronts Alex with a list of everything she wants him to change.

5.title: Getting Sexie with My Bestie
5.plot: Marshana's seductive side comes out as she and Stefan move things into the bedroom, while Charley's hot night with Darion is spoiled by an unexpected guest. Sydney is confident he'll finally lock lips with best friend Jin, and Alex gets Kris in a compromising position.

6.title: Hand in the Cookie Jar
6.plot: Marshana is in post-coital bliss after a night with best friend Stefan. Charley's eye wanders at Pride parade, and Kris pushes for Alex to declare his love. Meanwhile, fitness models and best friends Greg Plitt and Melanie Marden try their hand at romance.

7.title: Best Frenemies
7.plot: As Charley tries to make up with Darion, Kris and Alex' hit the rocks. Marshana discovers something about Stefan, while Melanie gives Greg mixed signals.

8.title: Make Up or Break Up
8.plot: In the season finale, Kris must decide if she can allow Alex to love her at his own speed, while Melanie and Greg turn up the heat on their budding relationship. Charley's actions may damage his friendship with Darion beyond repair, and Marshana meets Stefan's skeptical mother.

imdb.plot outline: What happens when platonic friends try to become more than just that? Friends to Lovers? chronicles pairs attempting to transition into exclusive romantic relationships. Not every couple will make it to happily-ever-after status, but the cameras capture it all, from the first kiss to the first fight to the first "morning after." An emotional roller coaster guaranteed to make you cringe from awkwardness one second and believe in true love in the next, Friends to Lovers? will find out which friendships are forever ruined and which couples will find true love in their best friend.
imdb.title: Friends to Lovers?
plot: These couples are taking their relationships out of the friendzone and into the fire, as they go from innocent to intimate and start dating.

What happens when platonic friends try to become more than just that? _Friends to Lovers?_ (qv) chronicles pairs attempting to transition into exclusive romantic relationships. Not every couple will make it to happily-ever-after status, but the cameras capture it all, from the first kiss to the first fight to the first "morning after." An emotional roller coaster guaranteed to make you cringe from awkwardness one second and believe in true love in the next, _Friends to Lovers?_ (qv) will find out which friendships are forever ruined and which couples will find true love in their best friend.
